gurmukhi: n rMg rwg rUp hY n rUp ryK rwr hY ]
transliteration: Na Ran Raag Roop Hai Na Roop Rekh Raar Hai||
translation: He is without affection for colour and form, He is without the dispute of beauty and line.

gurmukhi: n hwau hY n Bwau hY n dwau ko pRkwr hY ]18]178]
transliteration: Na Haau Hai Na Bhaau Hai Na Daau Ko Prakaar Hai||18||178||
translation: He is without gesticulation and charm and any kind of deception. 18.178.

gurmukhi: gjwDpI nrwDpI krMq syv hY sdw ]
transliteration: Gadaadhapoo Naraadhapoo Karant Sev Hai Sadaa||
translation: Indra and Kuber are always at Thy service.
The moon, sun and Varuna ever repeat Thy Name.

gurmukhi: Agsq Awid jy bfy qpspqI ibsyKIAY ]
translation: All the distinctive and great ascetics including Agastya etc;

gurmukhi: ibAMq ibAMq ibAMq ko krMq pwT pyKIAY ]19]179]
transliteration: Biant Biant Biant Ko Karant Paath Pekhooak||19||179||
translation: See them reciting the Praises of the Infinite and Limitless Lord.19.179.

gurmukhi: AgwD Awid dyvkI Anwd bwq mwnIAY ]
transliteration: Agaddh Aadh Devakoo Anaad Baat Maanooai||
translation: The discourse of that Profound and Primal Lord is without beginning.

gurmukhi: n jwq pwq mMqR im`qR s`qR snyh jwnIAY ]
transliteration: Na Jaat Paat Mantra Mittra Sattra Saneh Jaanooai||
translation: He hath no caste, lineage, adviser, friend, enemy and love.

gurmukhi: sdIv srb lok ky kiRpwl iKAwl mY rhY ]
transliteration: Sadoov Sarab Lok Ke Kridaal Khiaal Mai Rahai||
translation: I may always remain absorbed in the Beneficent Lord of all the worlds.

gurmukhi: qurMq dRoh dyh ky AnMq BwNiq so dhY ]20]180]
transliteration: Turant Droh Deh Ke Anant Bhaant(i) So Dahai||20||180||
translation: That Lord removes immediately all the infinite agonies of the body. 20.180.

gurmukhi: rUp rwg n ryK rMg n jnm mrn ibhIn ]
transliteration: Roop Raag Na Rekh Ran Na Janam Maran Bihoon||
translation: He is without form, affection, mark and colour and also without birth and death.

gurmukhi: Awid nwQ AgwD purK su Drm krm pRbIn ]
transliteration: Aadh Naath Agaddh Purakh Su Dharam Karam Praboon||
translation: He is the Primal Master, Unfathomable and All-Pervading Lord and also adept in pious actions.

gurmukhi: jMqR mMqR n qMqR jw ko Awid purK Apwr ]
transliteration: Jantra Manra Na Tantra Jaa Ko Aadh Purakh Apaar||
translation: He is the Primal and Infinite Purusha without any Yantra, Mantra and Tantra.
